author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter DITRA-HEAT cable tips…I always chisel out the subfloor and recess the cold splice. Also, I use both floor sensors, one is a backup. I keep the heat cables 2” from walls or curbs, 4” from vents, 7” from toilets, and 8” from other heating sources. Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this video. For written tutorials and step by step videos visit https://homerepairtutor.com 🔥#heatedfloor #ditraheat #schlutersystems #tilefloor #diy #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter DITRA-HEAT Cable Tips - #shorts #ditraheat #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
